This is Sniffle Bear, or "Sniffles" for short.
Sniffles was a gift from Auntie Mifuyu for your first birthday.
He's kind of stinky, but a good stinky.
While Sniffles would be a brave and faithful companion on this quest...

This is what's keeping your room bright right now.
You swear you once had a lamp that had a nightlight at the top that projected lights onto the ceiling.
Maybe it was just in a dream or in a movie.
The lamp may be a good light source while you're outside.
The problem is that it needs to be plugged in if you want it to be more than dead weight.
